title: FAIRagro Core Metadata Specification Schema
description: JSON-schema representing the FAIRagro Core Metadata Specification

identifier.description: Primary identifier of the dataset within the FAIRagro Search Hub

citation.description: A set of generic metadata for datasets

otherId.description: Another unique identifier for the Dataset (e.g. producer's or another repository's identifier)

otherIdValue.description: Another identifier uniquely identifies the Dataset

otherIdAgency.description: The name of the agency that generated the other identifier

title.description: The main title of the Dataset

alternativeTitle.description: Either 1) a title commonly used to refer to the Dataset or 2) an abbreviation of the main title

author.description: The entity, e.g. a person or organization, that created the Dataset

authorName.description: The name of the author, such as the person's name or the name of an organization

authorAffiliation.description: The name of the entity affiliated with the author, e.g. an organization's name

authorIdentifier.description: Uniquely identifies the author when paired with an identifier type

authorIdentifierScheme.description: The type of identifier that uniquely identifies the author (e.g. ORCID, ISNI)

contributor.description: The entity, such as a person or organization, responsible for collecting, managing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the Dataset

contributorName.description: The name of the contributor, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

contributorType.description: Indicates the type of contribution made to the dataset

datasetContact.description: The entity, e.g. a person or organization, that users of the Dataset can contact with questions

datasetContactName.description: The name of the point of contact, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

datasetContactAffiliation.description: The name of the entity affiliated with the point of contact, e.g. an organization's name

datasetContactEmail.description: The point of contact's email address

dsDescription.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset

dsDescriptionValue.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset

subject.description: The area of study relevant to the Dataset

keyword.description: A key term that describes an important aspect of the Dataset and information about any controlled vocabulary used

keywordValue.description: A key term that describes important aspects of the Dataset

keywordTermURI.description: A URI that points to the web presence of the Keyword Term

keywordVocabulary.description: The controlled vocabulary used for the keyword term (e.g. LCSH, MeSH)

keywordVocabularyURI.description: The URL where one can access information about the term's controlled vocabulary

language.description: A language that the Dataset's files are written in

productionDate.description: The date when the data were produced (not distributed, published, or archived)

distributionDate.description: The date when the Dataset was made available for distribution/presentation

publication.description: The article or report that uses the data in the Dataset. The full list of related publications will be displayed on the metadata tab

publicationCitation.description: The full bibliographic citation for the related publication

publicationIDType.description: The type of identifier that uniquely identifies a related publication

publicationIDNumber.description: The identifier for a related publication

publicationURL.description: The URL form of the identifier entered in the Identifier field, e.g. the DOI URL if a DOI was entered in the Identifier field. Used to display what was entered in the ID Type and ID Number fields as a link. If what was entered in the Identifier field has no URL form, the URL of the publication webpage is used, e.g. a journal article

relatedDatasets.description: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about a related dataset, such as previous research on the Dataset's subject

timePeriodCovered.description: The time period that the data refer to. Also known as span. This is the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding, collecting data, or making documents machine-readable

timePeriodCoveredStart.description: The start date of the time period that the data refer to

timePeriodCoveredEnd.description: The end date of the time period that the data refer to

generalExtended.description: A set of generic metadata for datasets

resourceType.description: The nature or genre of the resource.

accessRights.description: Information about who access the resource or an indication of its security status.

accessType.description: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.

yieldMeasurementMethod.description: Information on how the yield measurement of the dataset was generated.

dataSource.description: Experiment type or data source from which the dataset was generated.

sourceRDI.description: The original Research Data Infrastructure that the dataset was published by.

sourceRDIName.description: The name of the original Research Data Infrastructure that the dataset was published by.

sourceRDIURI.description: The landing page of the original Research Data Infrastructure that the dataset was published by.

sourceRDIID.description: A persistent identifier of the Research Data Infrastructure

sourceRDIIDvalue.description: The value of a Research Data Infrastructure identifier
sourceRDIIDvalue.display_name: Source Research Data Infrastructure identifier value

sourceRDIIDscheme.description: The scheme of a Research Data Infrastructure identifier
sourceRDIIDscheme.display_name: Source Research Data Infrastructure identifier scheme

sourceDatasetURI.description: A link to the original landing page of the dataset.

license.description: The terms under which this dataset has been published.

format.description: The file format(s) of the dataset.

dateModified.description: The date on which the Dataset was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified.

spatialResolution.description: Minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters.

versionNumber.description: The version number of the dataset.

variableMeasuredName.description: The name of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredAbbreviation.description: Abbreviation or short name of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredDescription.description: The description of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredValue.description: The value of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredValueURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a value of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredUnit.description: The unit of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredUnitURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a unit of a variable measured in the dataset.

variableMeasuredMeasurementTechnique.description: The technique used to measure a variable measured in the dataset.

geographicCoverage.description: Information on the geographic coverage of the data. Includes the total geographic scope of the data.

city.description: The name of the city that the Dataset is about. Use GeoNames for correct spelling and avoid abbreviations.

country.description: The country or nation that the Dataset is about.

state.description: The state or province that the Dataset is about. Use GeoNames for correct spelling and avoid abbreviations.

geographicBoundingBox.description: The fundamental geometric description for any Dataset that models geography is the geographic bounding box. It describes the minimum box, defined by west and east longitudes and north and south latitudes, which includes the largest geographic extent of the  Dataset's geographic coverage. This element is used in the first pass of a coordinate-based search. Inclusion of this element in the codebook is recommended, but is required if the bound polygon box is included.

westLongitude.description: Westernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -180.0 <= West  Bounding Longitude Value <= 180.0.

eastLongitude.description: Easternmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -180.0 <= East Bounding Longitude Value <= 180.0.

northLatitude.description: Northernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -90.0 <= North Bounding Latitude Value <= 90.0.

southLatitude.description: Southernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -90.0 <= South Bounding Latitude Value <= 90.0.

crop.description: A set of metadata describing crops.
A crop entity represents a sample of a speficic plant or group of plants, sharing the same taxonomic species, that are described in a dataset.

cropSpecies.description: Taxonomic crop species that is part of the dataset.

cropSpeciesURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a crop species that is part of the dataset.

cropVariety.description: A plant variety that is part of the dataset and that is a member of a defined group of plants, selected from within a species, with a common set of characteristics.

cropVarietyURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a crop variety that is part of the dataset.

cropSowingDate.description: Date of sowing when the described crop was planted.

cropHarvestingDate.description: Date when the described crop was harvested.

cropPestName.description: Name of a pest (e.g. insects, fungi, microorganisms) that has affected a crop.

cropPestURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a pest that is part of the dataset.

soil.description: A set of metadata describing soils.
A soil entity represents a speficic soil sample, that is described in a dataset, representative for a bigger unit of land.

soilTexture.description: Indication of relative contents of particles in the soil described in the dataset.

soilTextureURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a soil texture that is part of the dataset.

soilReferenceGroup.description: Reference Soil Groups are distinguished by the presence (or absence) of specific diagnostic horizons, properties and/or materials.

soilReferenceGroupURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a soil reference group that is part of the dataset.

soilPH.description: Hydrogen ion concentration in the soil.

soilBulkDensity.description: The mass of material particles divided by the bulk volume in g/cm³.

soilDepth.description: The depth at which a sample of soil is collected during a soil sampling process in centimeters.

soilTopDepth.description: The top depth at which a sample of soil is collected during a soil sampling process.

soilBottomDepth.description: The bottom depth at which a sample of soil is collected during a soil sampling process.

soilAvailableWaterContent.description: Quantity of water present in the soil and usable by plants, classically defined as the difference between moisture at field capacity and moisture at wilting point in m³/m³.

soilOrganicCarbon.description: Percentual share of solid carbon in the soil.

soilTotalCarbon.description: Percentual total amount of carbon in the soil.

soilTotalNitrogen.description: Percentual total amount of nitrogen in the soil.

plot.description: A set of metadata describing plots.
A plot of land is an area of land with a particular ownership, land use, or other characteristic. A plot is frequently used as the basis for a cadastre or land registration system.

plotLocationDescription.description: A description of the plot's location

plotLocationWestLongitude.description: Westernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the plot. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -180.0 <= West  Bounding Longitude Value <= 180.0.
plotLocationWestLongitude.display_name: Plot location bounding box western longitude

plotLocationEastLongitude.description: Easternmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the plot. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -180.0 <= East Bounding Longitude Value <= 180.0.
plotLocationEastLongitude.display_name: Plot location bounding box eastern longitude

plotLocationNorthLatitude.description: Northernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the plot. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -90.0 <= North Bounding Latitude Value <= 90.0.
plotLocationNorthLatitude.display_name: Plot location bounding box northern latitude

plotLocationSouthLatitude.description: Southernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the plot. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -90.0 <= South Bounding Latitude Value <= 90.0.
plotLocationSouthLatitude.display_name: Plot location bounding box southern latitude

plotCropYield.description: The amount of plant crop (such as cereal, grain or legume) harvested per unit area for a given time in dt/ha.

plotElevation.description: Altitude, like elevation, is the distance above sea level in meters.

plotSize.description: The size of a specific plot measured in m².

plotSpatialReferenceSystem.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) or coordinate reference system (CRS) used to express the geographic information of a plot.

sensor.description: A set of metadata describing sensors.
A sensor entity represents a specific sensor, that is described in a dataset, or was used to create measurements in it.

sensorIsHostedBy.description: Relation between a sensor and the platform that it is mounted on or hosted by.

sensorPlatformType.description: The specific type of a platform a sensor is hosted by.

sensorPlatformTypeURI.description: Reference to a resource (e.g. a terminology concept) representing a platform type that is part of the dataset.

sensorPlatformModelName.description: Name of a specific platform model.

sensorPlatformManufacturerName.description: Name of the manufacturer of a specific platform.

sensorActivityType.description: Describes if the sensor is an active or a passive sensor.

sensorSensorType.description: Describes what type of information the sensor measures.

sensorBandCategory.description: Describes if a sensor uses single, multi or hyper spectral bands.

sensorSpectralBand.description: Describes a specific spectral band(s) of a sensor.

agriculturalProcess.description: A set of metadata describing planned processes which occur in an agricultural field.
An agricultural process entity represents a specific agricultural process, that is described in a dataset.

agriculturalProcessName.description: The name of a planned process which occurs in an agricultural field.

chemicalSubstance.description: A set of metadata describing chemical substances such as fertilizers and pesticides.
A specific chemical substance described in the dataset.

chemicalSubstanceName.description: The name of a chemical substance.

chemicalSubstanceApprovalNumber.description: The approval number if a chemical substance registered by an approval agency.
